attributes.action: introduce legislation to make it a legal requirement for any elected politician who 'changes sides' to resign and submit themselves for re-election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an absolutely ludicrous and fraudulent position for anybody who is elected to represent a voter population on one ticket to change to a new ticket without having to submit for re-election.  Anybody who 'changes sides' mid term who does not submit to re-election is a fraudster!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
